sub_title: Marketing Manager at Microsoft, Western Europe
summary:
Passionate about Marketing and Technology. My objective for the next 3 years is to grow and learn different aspects of Digital Marketing. 

I started my career in Operations Management which gave me structured thinking and project management skills. I then decided to shift to a more creative field, choosing Marketing Management as my Master's Major. From then, I have been working at Microsoft — first as a Digital Marketing Assistant, then as the Social Media & Content Strategist and now as a Marketing and Digital Specialist for Iberia.

Traveling is my purpose and I highlight the 4 months I spent backpacking South America as my most enriching experience. I also love to cook world cuisine and live Lisbon at fullest.
